languages.text: "Нелепым кажется то, что вы вдруг приняли меня за {mf|друга|подружку} и решили, будто ваши душевные терзания кому-то здесь интересны".

traits.locale_text: "Нелепым кажется то, что вы вдруг приняли меня за {mf|друга|подружку} и решили, будто ваши душевные терзания кому-то здесь интересны".

languages.text: "What I find childish is your manner of addressing me as if I were your friend and your mistaken belief that anyone here would be interested in hearing about your emotional turmoil."
languages.original_text: "Нелепым кажется то, что вы вдруг приняли меня за {mf|друга|подружку} и решили, будто ваши душевные терзания кому-то здесь интересны".

traits.locale_text: "What I find childish is your way of addressing me as if I were a friend of yours and your belief that anyone here is interested in hearing about your emotional turmoils."
"What I find childish is your way of addressing me as if I were a friend of yours and your belief that anyone here is interested in hearing about your emotional turmoils."
"What I find childish is your manner of addressing me as if I were your friend and your mistaken belief that anyone here would be interested in hearing about your emotional turmoil."
"What I find childish is your manner of addressing me as if I were your friend and your mistaken belief that anyone here would be interested in hearing about your emotional turmoil."
"What I find childish is your manner of addressing me as if I were your friend and your mistaken belief that anyone here would be interested in hearing about your emotional turmoil."

languages.text: "Was ich kindisch finde, ist die Tatsache, dass Ihr mich ansprecht, als wären wir befreundet. Und Euren Irrglauben, dass jeder hier daran interessiert ist, von Eurer emotionalen Unruhe zu hören."
languages.original_text: "What I find childish is your manner of addressing me as if I were your friend and your mistaken belief that anyone here would be interested in hearing about your emotional turmoil."

traits.locale_text: "Was ich kindisch finde, ist die Tatsache, dass Ihr mich ansprecht, als wären wir befreundet. Und Euren Irrglauben, dass jeder hier daran interessiert ist, von Eurer emotionalen Unruhe zu hören."

languages.text: « Ce que je trouve enfantin, c'est votre manière de vous adresser à moi comme si j'étais votre {mf|ami|amie} et de croire à tort que quelqu'un ici pourrait s'intéresser à vos troubles émotionnels. »
languages.original_text: "What I find childish is your manner of addressing me as if I were your friend and your mistaken belief that anyone here would be interested in hearing about your emotional turmoil."

traits.locale_text: « Ce que je trouve enfantin, c'est votre manière de vous adresser à moi comme si j'étais votre {mf|ami|amie} et de croire à tort que quelqu'un ici pourrait s'intéresser à vos troubles émotionnels. »

languages.text: “你真正幼稚的地方，在于错把我当成了可以倾诉的朋友，而且以为人人都愿意驻足聆听你那不值一提的悲春伤秋。”
languages.original_text: "What I find childish is your manner of addressing me as if I were your friend and your mistaken belief that anyone here would be interested in hearing about your emotional turmoil."

traits.locale_text: “你真正幼稚的地方，在于错把我当成了可以倾诉的朋友，而且以为人人都愿意驻足聆听你那不值一提的悲春伤秋。”

languages.text: 「私が子供じみていると思うのは、あなたがまるで私を友人のように扱って話しかけてくることと、あなたの激しい感情の動きに関する話を誰もが興味を持って聞いてくれるはずだと誤解していることだ」
languages.original_text: "What I find childish is your manner of addressing me as if I were your friend and your mistaken belief that anyone here would be interested in hearing about your emotional turmoil."

traits.locale_text: 「私が子供じみていると思うのは、あなたがまるで私を友人のように扱って話しかけてくることと、あなたの激しい感情の動きに関する話を誰もが興味を持って聞いてくれるはずだと誤解していることだ」

languages.text: «Lo que me resulta infantil es su manera de dirigirse a mí como si fuera su amigo y su creencia errónea de que a alguien de aquí le interesan sus agitaciones emocionales».
languages.original_text: "What I find childish is your manner of addressing me as if I were your friend and your mistaken belief that anyone here would be interested in hearing about your emotional turmoil."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que me resulta infantil es su manera de dirigirse a mí como si fuera su amigo y su creencia errónea de que a alguien de aquí le interesan sus agitaciones emocionales».

languages.text: "Bana asıl çocuksu gelen, bana arkadaşınmışım gibi hitap etmen ve yaşadığın duygusal çalkantıların buradakilerin umurunda olacağını sanman."
languages.original_text: "What I find childish is your manner of addressing me as if I were your friend and your mistaken belief that anyone here would be interested in hearing about your emotional turmoil."
